constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 172 (Friday, October 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROSENDALE:
H.R. 5463.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H5593]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

sponsors.fullName: Rep. Rosendale Sr., Matthew M. [R-MT-At Large]

title: Drug Pricing Transparency and Accountability Act
